name: Mobile developer
description:
About Checkme

Checkme is a crucial helping tool for traditional health insurance companies to continue their growth in a digitizing world. By providing insurers with an exceptional SaaS solution, we change how employees and HRDs get health insurance services. A rapid high-quality digital solution via mobile and web applications instead of time-consuming waiting hours.

We are a team of 50+ dedicated employees, working fully remotely, started in 2020, and already operating in 7 countries: Mexico, UAE, Armenia, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Uzbekistan, and Russia. We are growing by 25% monthly. Our goal is to launch in other countries of the LATAM market (Brazil, Chile, and Columbia) by the end of 2022.

Our clients are among the top world IT companies such as Miro, inDriver, SkyEng, YouDo, Usedesk, and Ticketscloud.

About the role

We are looking to hire an experienced product-oriented Mobile Developer to help the product team build a great mobile experience. The primary focus will be implementing new user interfaces and features with automated tests.

Responsibilities

  • Implementing new UI and features into Checkme mobile apps on iOS and Android platforms;
  • Deliver cleanly organized highest quality code;
  • Create and improve automated tests;
  • Permanently improve mobile app performance;
  • Ensure excellent user experience;
  • Communicate with users to understand their needs and experiences.

Requirements

  • Portfolio of released applications on the App Store / Play Market;
  • 5+ years of React native commercial experience;
  • Superior analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude;
  • Ability to perform in a team environment;
  • Programming languages: Typescript, Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift;
  • Experience with Mobx state management;
  • Proficient in MVVM, Clean architecture;
  • Experience with Firebase Push Notifications;
  • Experience with analytics services (Firebase Analytics, Amplitude);
  • Experience with Firebase Crashlytics;
  • Experience with CI/CD (Fastlane, Gitlab CI);
  • English is B2/C1 level.

Nice-to-haves

  • Experience working in distributed teams;
  • Experience working in scrum teams;
  • Strong oral and written communication skills;
  • Experience with Voximplant, Mapbox, Reanimated, i18next, Dayjs;
  • Writing native modules.

Conditions

  • High-growing start-up company distracting the insurance market in LATAM;
  • Competitive base salary;
  • Remote work and LATAM market working hours;
  • International team with top-level ambitions.
